body:
@brianhlin The rpmbuild fails because it is unable to find bdii related files:

```
RPM build errors:
    File not found: /home/centos/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/htcondor-ce-1.20-2.el6.x86_64/var/lib/bdii/gip/provider/condor_ce_bdii_generate_glue1.py
    File not found: /home/centos/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/htcondor-ce-1.20-2.el6.x86_64/var/lib/bdii/gip/provider/condor_ce_bdii_generate_glue2.py
    File not found: /home/centos/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/htcondor-ce-1.20-2.el6.x86_64/usr/share/condor-ce/config.d/06-ce-bdii-defaults.conf
    File not found: /home/centos/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/htcondor-ce-1.20-2.el6.x86_64/etc/condor-ce/config.d/06-ce-bdii.conf
```
